statements: SELECT * FROM customer_purchase_history;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date, total_amount FROM customer_purchase_history;
SELECT product_id, quantity FROM customer_purchase_history WHERE total_amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM customer_purchase_history ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM customer_purchase_history GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_purchase_history ORDER BY purchase_date DESC, total_amount ASC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM customer_purchase_history GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_quantity > 10;
SELECT AVG(total_amount) FROM customer_purchase_history WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT product_id, AVG(total_amount) AS avg_amount FROM customer_purchase_history GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY avg_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date, quantity * total_amount AS total_price FROM customer_purchase_history WHERE customer_id = '1262b1c6-0cc2-4cbc-86bb-2839ddc62a21';
SELECT * FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory;
SELECT customer_id, total_amount, purchase_date FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category, price FROM Product WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM Product ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 5000;
SELECT customer_id, product_name, total_amount FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory LEFT JOIN Product ON CustomerPurchaseHistory.product_id = Product.product_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC;

SELECT product_name, SUM(total_amount) AS total_revenue FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory LEFT JOIN Product ON CustomerPurchaseHistory.product_id = Product.product_id GROUP BY product_name ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, registration_date FROM customers ORDER BY registration_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE status = 'Pending' AND total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age >= 30 ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, category, price FROM customers JOIN products ON customer_id = product_id WHERE stock_quantity > 0;
SELECT MAX(total_amount) AS max_total_amount FROM orders;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) AS order_count FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING order_count > 2 ORDER BY order_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number='1234567890';
SELECT product_id, name, price FROM products ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, count(*) AS total_purchases FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date FROM purchases JOIN purchase_history ON purchases.purchase_id = purchase_history.purchase_id WHERE purchases.quantity > 3;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC;

SELECT p.name AS product_name, p.category, pr.price AS product_price FROM products p INNER JOIN purchases pu ON p.product_id = pu.product_id INNER JOIN customers c ON pu.customer_id = c.customer_id INNER JOIN purchase_history ph ON pu.purchase_id = ph.purchase_id ORDER BY product_price DESC;

SELECT c.name AS customer_name, COUNT(ph.history_id) AS total_purchases FROM customers c LEFT JOIN purchase_history ph ON c.customer_id = ph.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_id HAVING total_purchases > 5;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT purchase_date, total_amount FROM purchases WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date, total_amount FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT discount_code, discount_percentage FROM discounts WHERE discount_percentage >= 10 ORDER BY discount_percentage ASC;
